query:
ALTER TABLE domain_orders 
ADD COLUMN personaId INT NULL COMMENT 'Bound AI persona ID (null if not bound)',
ADD COLUMN isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE COMMENT 'Whether domain is published',
ADD COLUMN publishedAt TIMESTAMP NULL COMMENT 'When domain was published';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user VqBKoEwKfw4feq4.6cd8cd1ff95f --database aavW9BLbZ6sZHaPEemayyD --execute ALTER TABLE domain_orders 
ADD COLUMN personaId INT NULL COMMENT 'Bound AI persona ID (null if not bound)',
ADD COLUMN isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE COMMENT 'Whether domain is published',
ADD COLUMN publishedAt TIMESTAMP NULL COMMENT 'When domain was published';
